snippet: Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan, asked in a radio interview whether Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was a “Catholic in good standing,” said he would not disclose the contents of his pastoral discussions.
abstract: Cardinal Timothy M Dolan, Roman Catholic archbishop of New York, ratchets up his criticism of Gov Andrew Cuomo's continued advocacy for abortion rights.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan, asked in a radio interview whether Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was a “Catholic in good standing,” said he would not disclose the contents of his pastoral discussions.
